title: OCF Manifest File
description: Top-level schema describing the OCF Manifest, which holds issuer information and references ocf files containing transactions, stakeholders, stock classes, etc.

ocf_version.description: OCF Version Identifier -- the current semantic version (https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html)

file_type.description: File type field (used to select proper schema for validation)
file_type.title: Enum - OCF File Type

country_of_formation.description: The country where the issuer company was legally formed (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2)
country_of_formation.title: Type - Country Code

country_subdivision_of_formation.description: The state, province, or subdivision where the issuer company was legally formed
country_subdivision_of_formation.title: Type - Country Subdivision Code

tax_ids.title: Issuer - Tax ID Array
tax_ids.description: The tax ids for this issuer company

items.title: Type - Tax Identifier
items.description: Type representation of a government identifier for tax purposes (e.g. EIN) and corresponding country code (ISO-3166)

country.description: Issuing country code (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2) for the tax identifier
country.title: Type - Country Code

email.description: A work email that the issuer company can be reached at
email.title: Type - Email

email_type.description: Type of e-mail address (e.g. personal or business)
email_type.title: Enum - Email Type

phone.description: A phone number that the issuer company can be reached at
phone.title: Type - Phone

phone_type.description: Type of phone number (e.g. mobile, home or business)
phone_type.title: Enum - Phone Type

phone_number.description: A valid phone number string in ITU E.123 international notation (e.g. +123 123 456 7890). An extension number, if applicable, should be separated by words ''extension'' or ''ext.'' after the phone number (e.g. +123 123 456 7890 ext. 100).

address.description: The headquarters address of the issuing company
address.title: Type - Address

address_type.description: What type of address is this (e.g. legal address, contact address, etc.)
address_type.title: Enum - Address Type

country_subdivision.description: State, province, or equivalent identifier required for an address in this country
country_subdivision.title: Type - Country Subdivision Code

country.description: Country code for this address (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2)
country.title: Type - Country Code

initial_shares_authorized.description: The initial number of shares authorized for this issuer

oneOf.title: Type - Numeric
oneOf.description: Fixed-point string representation of a number (up to 10 decimal places supported)

comments.description: Unstructured text comments related to and stored for the object

as_of.description: The point-in-time represented by this OCF Package
as_of.title: Type - Date

generated_at.description: Timestamp of when the package was generated. Useful when determining which set of data is most up-to-date, if presented with two packages that have the same `as_of` date, but different cap table data.

comments.title: Cap Table - Comment Array
comments.description: Unstructured text comments related to and stored for the cap table

stock_plans_files.title: Cap Table - Stock Plans File(s) Array
stock_plans_files.description: List of files containing lists of issuer stock plans, indexed from the file containing the first such object created to the file containing the last (See separate /schema/files/stock_plans_file schema to validate loaded files)

filepath.description: Path to the file within the OCF container

stock_legend_templates_files.title: Cap Table - Stock Legend Templates File(s) Array
stock_legend_templates_files.description: List of files containing lists of issuer stock legend templates, indexed from the file containing the first such object created to the file containing the last (See separate /schema/files/stock_legend_templates_file schema to validate loaded files)

filepath.description: Path to the file within the OCF container

stock_classes_files.title: Cap Table - Stock Classes File(s) Array
stock_classes_files.description: List of files containing lists of issuer stock classes, indexed from the file containing the first such object created to the file containing the last (See separate /schema/files/stock_classes_file schema to validate loaded files)

filepath.description: Path to the file within the OCF container

vesting_terms_files.title: Cap Table - Vesting Terms File(s) Array
vesting_terms_files.description: List of files containing lists of issuer vesting terms, indexed from the file containing the first such object created to the file containing the last (See separate /schema/files/vesting_terms_file schema to validate loaded files)

filepath.description: Path to the file within the OCF container

valuations_files.title: Cap Table - Valuation File(s) Array
valuations_files.description: List of files containing lists of issuer valuations, indexed from the file containing the first such object created to the file containing the last (See separate /schema/files/valuations_file schema to validate loaded files)

filepath.description: Path to the file within the OCF container

transactions_files.title: Cap Table - Transaction File(s) Array
transactions_files.description: List of files containing lists of issuer transactions, indexed from the file containing the first such object created to the file containing the last (See separate /schema/files/transactions_file schema to validate loaded files)

filepath.description: Path to the file within the OCF container

stakeholders_files.title: Cap Table - Stakeholder File(s) Array
stakeholders_files.description: List of files containing lists of issuer stakeholders, indexed from the file containing the first such object created to the file containing the last (See separate /schema/files/stakeholders_file schema to validate loaded files)

filepath.description: Path to the file within the OCF container

financings_files.title: Cap Table - Financing File(s) Array
financings_files.description: List of files containing lists of financings, indexed from the file containing the first such object created to the file containing the last (See separate /schema/files/financings_file schema to validate loaded files)

filepath.description: Path to the file within the OCF container

documents_files.title: Cap Table - Document File(s) Array
documents_files.description: List of files containing lists of document paths, indexed from the file containing the first such object created to the file containing the last (See separate /schema/files/documents_file schema to validate loaded files)

filepath.description: Path to the file within the OCF container
